title: The Embarrassing Days of Accidentally Wearing the Same Clothes as the Campus Prince - Novel Updates
genre: School Life   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life   Yaoi
tags: Awkward Protagonist   Cold Love Interests   Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   Dense Protagonist   Modern Day   Popular Love Interests   Short Story
author: Young Master Chi   迟小爷
description:
“I came up with ten thousand clumsy ways to try and get your attention. This was just one of them.”

Tong Yao thinks he cannot be more ordinary. With a mediocre figure, a standard appearance, average grades, and a normal family background……absolutely nothing about him was special.

So why was Jiang Jinyue, the Campus Prince and Tong Yao’s secret crush, suddenly copying his wardrobe?!

A short and sweet story about getting together with the Campus Prince.>
